Author: Atrix
Title: [ANN][ATRIX] Atrix, ICO guarantee system - Token sale 2.0
Body: What is Atrix?   We are the pioneers of Token sale 2.0  And we are setting up the new initial contribution rules. Our goal is to make projects more financially transparent for the contributors, by offering an initial contribution buyback guarantee, in the event that the contributor is not satisfied with the progress of the projects in the future.  We would like to incorporate this functionality into all future crypto projects. These changes are necessary, because you as contributors, are the reason the crypto world even exists.Till today early adopters were not protected and they couldn’t get their initial contribution back, if the project didn’t deliver the promised results. We are about to change that. Our mission is to become the ESCROW account in the new ecosystem of Token Sale 2.0 for every new crypto project. ATRIX is the first token in the world, which offers its users a minimum of 80% buyback guarantee for the period of 5 years, based on their initial contribution.  https://i.imgur.com/5qlisIm.jpg  What makes ATRIX different? ATRIX is : -UNIQUE We are the only token in the world which offers 80% guarantee based on your initial contribution.  -SAFE Security is our top priority. All your contributions are secure and kept in the safest wallets.  -TRANSPARENT All our business plans, costs, information and investment plans will always be transparent and publicly accessible.  -USEFUL Our token has multiple unique utility features within ATRIX platform https://i.imgur.com/1R0Ap3M.png  What are the benefits of buying ATRIX?  Token -ERC20 Token -Limited number of 45,000.000 ATRIX -Set sell price of 2 USD -Set minimum buyback price of 1.6 USD -AND MUCH MORE  Buyback -5 year guarantee for ATRIX token buyback -24/7 buyback for ATRIX token -Possibility of buyback price rise -The buyback price sets the lowest token price on the market (safety against volatility) -AND MUCH MORE  Loan -Loan without interest and costs of approval for all ATRIX token owners -Loan payout within 24 hours -Loan payout in BTC or ETH -Retain the value of your ATRIX portfolio regardless of the loan -AND MUCH MORE  KYC System -Decentralized KYC system -International use of the system -The system is adapter to crypto currency regulations -One time registration for all users -AND MUCH MORE  Seed  -Investments into safe blockchain projects   -International incubator     -BUYBACK GUARANTEE for all buyers/investors -VIP pre-investment rights for all ATRIX token owners -AND MUCH MORE  Timeline https://i.imgur.com/6nDxgrq.png https://i.imgur.com/cJ0ZlX1.png https://i.imgur.com/iHfRmFj.png  Atrix Token Distribution http://https://i.imgur.com/KVNt17O.png  Our Team :  Adel Djutovič : PROJECT LEAD (CEO) | Linkedin  Denis Avguštin : CTO | Linkedin  Primož Cimerman : COO | Linkedin  Adnan Puzić : LEAD DESIGNER | Linkedin  Žiga Kerec : DEVELOPER | Linkedin  Blaž Bundara : MARKETING MANAGER | Linkedin  Dolores Špoljarič : CUSTOMER CARE https://i.imgur.com/3i0Uvec.png  Our  Advisors :  Aleš Tomažin : STRATEGY ADVISOR | Linkedin  Peter Merc : LEGAL ADVISOR | Linkedin  Goran Radulović : MARKETING ADVISOR | Linkedin https://i.imgur.com/tdGMzb0.png  FAQ  Q : How can I get Atrix token? A : You can get ATRIX token by participating in the ATRIX presale or token sale. To join our presale or token sale u have to thru KYC and whitelisting process. Once completed, you can check your tokens from the Myetherwallet.  Q : What is a Token Sale? A : Token sale is a process of raising crypto-capital through a crowdfunding campaign by distributing token to the contributors. A digital asset or token is issued for a specific purpose with platform utility in mind. After the token sale process is done, the tokens may be used in a platform or traded on crypto-exchanges, with market supply and demand deciding on its fair value.  Q : Where are you based and what is your legal structure? A : ATRIX is incorporated in United Kingdom, with our Engineering operations being based in Slovenia, and having advisors and collaborators from all over the world, including US, China, Switzerland and UK.  Q : What crypto-currencies will be accepted during the token sale? A : Our ICO will be ETH (Ether) only.  Q : Is there a minimum investment stake? A : No, there is no minimum investment stake.  Q : Is there a maximum investment stake? A : Yes, there is a maximum investment stake. After validating your KYC you will be able to invest max 200ETH.  Q : Will I be able to trade my Atrix Token (ATRIX) on Cryptocurrency Exchanges? A : Yes! We are working with multiple, well-known exchanges to list ATRIX as soon as possible!  Q : How do I store my Atrix? Are there any best practices to follow? A : MyEtherWallet works well, we also recommend hardware wallets such as the Trezor. As long as your wallet supports ERC20 tokens you’ll be able to hold tokens with it, but in order to register for the presale we will also provide instructions on how to do this if you don’t already have a wallet.  Q : I want to participate in your ICO. Can I contribute with fiat currency (eg: USD, EUR, GBP, CHF, RMB)? A : Unfortunately, we will only accept contributions in ETH.   Useful links : Reddit | Website | Facebook Twitter | Telegram | Medium Whitepaper | Support

Author: Lituation
Title: [ANN][ATRIX] Atrix, ICO guarantee system - Token sale 2.0
Body: I've been hearing a lot of Buzz about tokin 2.0 and Ico 2.0 I honestly am not sure I get what the difference is. is it some kind of new mechanism or process that's better or more transparent than the way things have been done before? If so I'm all for it but everything is just really murky about what this is and pretty much everything I've seen about the concept has been in Russian.

Title: [ANN][ATRIX] Atrix, ICO guarantee system - Token sale 2.0
Body: Hi everyone! Just added Atrix ICO to my website https://concourseq.io/Q/Atrix. ConcourseQ is a collaborative due dilligence community that researches and reviews ICOs. Anyone with an account can submit information to your page, so we are reaching out to this community to get you all involved in the discussion. Thanks! (PS: Team welcome to add sale details)
